wiki.content:
"When the Night Feels My Song" is the first single from Sounding a Mosaic, the second album from Canadian band Bedouin Soundclash. The song features a reggae/soft rock sound, and is accompanied by a music video that shows the band on various streets during the night, in Toronto, Canada. The song reached #1 on the CFNY charts in Canada. The song is what would be referred to as the "breakthrough single" for the band. The next single released was "Shelter".
 The streets were not closed for the video, so anyone seen in the video was not cast, and just happened to walk by during filming. The video reached #1 on the MuchMusic Countdown charts in November of 2005, after entering the chart in September of that year.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "When the Night Feels My Song" is the first single from Sounding a Mosaic, the second album from Canadian band Bedouin Soundclash. The song reached #1 on the CFNY charts in Canada. The song is what would be referred to as the "breakthrough single" for the band. The next single released was "Shelter".

track.name: When the Night Feels My Song
comments: Such a good, happy track. Never gets old.
Its all a bit Jack (what a prick) Johnson.
twas awesomeeee!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! even his momma was singing!!!! by the side of the stage!
Gives the soul a tug and allows the peace and beauty of the day to settle in...its our musical reminder to stop and smell the roses
very wonderful song.. ever and everever!

This track made our Indie Rock Playlist this month! Check out the other great bands as well http://www.musicbirdsandcereal.net/2010/07/playlist-music-birds-cereal-july-2010.html

Anyone a fan of anything else?
Discuss at our playlist group 
http://www.last.fm/group/Music%2C+Birds+and+Cereal
Hey beautiful day. Sun shining, cold beer and this song. Awesome.
Just have to dance when I'm listening to this
